Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyze the Request Source Material A long description of a property management companys onboarding process Role I am the interviewer Goal Ask a series of questions to clarify and improve understanding of the process Specific Objectives Uncover missing details understand decision criteria clarify roles responsibilities verify timing sequencing learn about exception handling Constraints No SQL queries or implementation details Focus on conceptual understanding Use targeted open ended questions

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Process Description Deconstruction Phase 1 Initial Contact Documentation Landlord contacts regional office Coordinator reviews docs deeds compliance certs inspection reports Check for missing docs Record details sq ft units etc into DB Phase 2 Manager Assignment Assign property manager based on workload geo experience track record Intro call meeting Phase 3 Inspection Photography Schedule photographer inspector Fix issues Phase 4 Marketing Activation Digital marketing listings brochures pricing Property activated Phase 5 Tenant Screening Screen apps credit employment refs Negotiate if multiple Phase 6 Lease Finalization Finalize lease deposit move in Phase 7 Quality Checks Audits Compliance officer financial analyst IT Exceptions special insurance custom clauses Communication tools

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Identify Areas for Clarification Gap Analysis Phase 1 Docs What happens if landlord never provides docs timeout What defines outdated Who owns relationship Phase 2 Assignment How is assignment decision made manual automated What if no manager fits How defined unique requirements Phase 3 Inspection Trigger to move to marketing formal sign off Who pays if falls through Phase 4 Marketing What determines market trends Who approves final price Phase 5 Screening Specific criteria suitable tenant Appeals process How authorized discounts Phase 6 Lease What during gap lease to move in Final walkthrough Phase 7 Audits When do audits parallel sequential What if audit fails after move in Exceptions How identified special insurance How common custom clauses who approves General SLAs Handoffs

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Drafting Questions Iterative refinement for Open ended and Conceptual Draft 1 Docs How long wait Better Can you describe the follow up procedure if landlord fails to submit required documentation within specific timeframe Draft 2 Manager Assignment How choose manager Better Could you walk me through the decision making matrix used when assigning property manager particularly when multiple managers meet initial criteria Draft 3 Inspection What if fails Better If inspector identifies safety issues what is escalation process to resolve repairs and does this pause onboarding timeline Draft 4 Pricing Who sets price Better How is authority split between digital marketing team and financial analyst regarding final approval of rental price Draft 5 Audits When do audits Better The description mentions quality checks at end at what specific point in timeline do these audits trigger and what is remediation plan if lease found non compliant after signed Draft 6 Exceptions What about custom clauses Better How does system handle exception requests such as custom lease clauses or special insurance requirements and who has final authority to approve deviations Draft 7 Roles Who talks to whom Better Regarding communication tools is there formal protocol for handoffs between property coordinator and property manager to ensure no information lost

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Categorizing and Polishing the Questions need to ensure cover specific goals missing details decision criteria roles timing exceptions Category Documentation Verification Phase 1 Category Manager Assignment Handoff Phase 2 Category Inspection Remediation Phase 3 Category Pricing Marketing Phase 4 Category Tenant Screening Leasing Phases 56 Category Audits Compliance Exceptions Phase 7

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final Review against Constraints SQL No Implementation details No Open ended Yes Conceptual Yes

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Final Output Generation Proceeding to generate response based on drafted points Self Correction during generation Make sure questions sound natural and professional as if spoken in interview Ensure probe why and how rather than what Self Correction Example Instead of Do you use spreadsheet for manager assignment ask What mechanisms are in place to handle situations where ideal property manager is at full capacity

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Final Polish Organize list logically to follow flow of process Intro Establish context Sections Initial intake Manager assignment Inspection Fixes Marketing Pricing Tenant Lease Audits Compliance Closing Wrap up This aligns with thought process to produce final output
